title: Calories in Tuna Subway Sandwich
meta_description: Discover calories in tuna subway sandwich: a 6-inch sub has about 480 kcal, plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, carbs, fat, and customization tips.
assumptions: 6-inch Subway Tuna sub on white bread with tuna salad (tuna mixed with mayo), lettuce, tomatoes, onions, cucumbers, green peppers; no cheese or extra sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, bread type, portion size, and preparation. Check Subway's app or site for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 6-inch Tuna Subway sandwich provides ~480 kcal and ~20 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a 6-inch tuna subway sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for a standard 6-inch Tuna sub.

faqs.q: What's the protein in tuna subway sandwich?
faqs.a: About 20 g protein per 6-inch sandwich, mainly from the tuna.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in tuna subway sandwich?
faqs.a: Yes, around 44 g carbs, mostly from the bread; fiber is ~5 g.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a tuna subway sandwich?
faqs.a: Roughly 870 mg, due to tuna salad, bread, and veggies.

faqs.q: Calories in tuna subway sandwich without bread?
faqs.a: Tuna salad portion alone is ~200-250 kcal; subtract bread for estimate.
